body_html: @asimshankar . I have also tried with Python 3.5.2 and Tensorflow '1.4.0' which is installed with pip3 tensorflow - gpu. I got same wrong results. 3.0 [1. 3.] I think the problem is related to GPU, it is old and has small memory. Thank you for your all effort.

body: @asimshankar  . I have also tried with Python 3.5.2 and Tensorflow '1.4.0' which is installed with pip3 tensorflow - gpu. I got same wrong results. `3.0 [1. 3.]`  I think the problem is related to GPU, it is old and has small memory. Thank you for your all effort.
